name: Iron tools pipeline
goal: Efficiently craft a full set of iron tools (1 iron_pickaxe, 1 iron_axe, one iron_shovel, and 1 iron_sword)

steps.title: Mine 3 oak_log
checks: Have 3 oak_log or more in inventory

steps.title: Craft starter kit
steps.details: Craft 12 oak_plank from your 3 oak_log. Then craft 6 stick (3 oak_plank). Then craft 1 crafting_table (4 oak_plank) and place it on the ground. Then craft 1 wooden_pickaxe (3 oak_plank & 2 stick) and equip it - REQUIRED to mine stone.
checks: Have a crafting_table placed on the ground
Have wooden_pickaxe equipped — this is CRITICAL for mining stone

steps.title: Mine 11 cobblestone
steps.details: Mine stone with your wooden_pickaxe to get 11 cobblestone.
checks: Have 11 cobblestone or more in inventory

steps.title: Craft stone_pickaxe and furnace
steps.details: Craft a furnace (8 cobblestone) and place it on the ground. Craft a stone_pickaxe (3 cobblestone + 2 stick) and equip it — REQUIRED to mine iron_ore.
checks: Have furnace placed on the ground
Have stone_pickaxe equipped — this is CRITICAL for mining iron_ore

steps.title: Mine 2 coal
steps.details: You need 2 at least coal to smelt 9 iron_ore.
checks: Have 2 coal or more in inventory

steps.title: Mine 9 iron_ore
steps.details: Locate iron_ore using perception. Mine 9 iron_ore (it drops raw_iron) with your stone_pickaxe.
checks: Have 9 raw_iron or more in inventory

steps.title: Smelt 9 iron_ingot
steps.details: Place 9 raw_iron in the top slot of the furnace and 2 coal in the bottom slot. Smelt all 9 raw_iron into 9 iron_ingot. Withdraw all iron_ingot.
checks: Have 9 iron_ingot or more in inventory

steps.title: Craft all iron tools
steps.details: Using the crafting_table, craft in this priority order: 1) iron_pickaxe (3 iron_ingot + 2 stick), 2) iron_sword (2 iron_ingot + 1 stick), 3) iron_axe (3 iron_ingot + 2 stick), 4) iron_shovel (1 iron_ingot + 2 stick). Total: 9 iron_ingot + 7 stick.

steps.title: Equip tools
steps.details: Equip iron pickaxe. Verify all 4 items were crafted successfully by checking inventory. The Iron Tools Pipeline is complete when you have: iron_pickaxe, iron_sword, iron_shovel, iron_axe.
